title: World leaders unite to call for pandemic treaty, saying: 'No one is safe until we are all safe'
content:
1. World leaders unite to call for pandemic treaty, saying: 'No one is safe until we are all safe'  CNN
  2. Global leaders call for a pandemic treaty — but U.S. and China remain silent  CNBC
  3. Covid-19: World leaders call for international pandemic treaty @BBC News live BBC  BBC

  5. OPINION | Covid-19 shows why united action is needed for more robust international health architecture  TimesLIVE

localize.title: 世界各国领导人联合呼吁签订流行病条约，他们说："在我们所有人都安全之前，没有人是安全的。
世界各國領導人聯合呼籲簽訂流行病條約，他們說："在我們所有人都安全之前，沒有人是安全的。
